is_custom.description: Indicates if the setting is custom for the app or the organization scope. `true` means it has been customized by the user; If no custom setting exists for the app, the organization's setting value is used with `is_custom` set to `false` (regardless the value coming from organization is custom or not). If no custom setting exists for the organization, a default setting is used with `is_custom` set to `false`.

app_container_setting_resource_type.description: Container setting for app resource type

organization_container_opt_out_code_reso.description: Container opt-out code for organization resource type

organization_container_setting_resource_.description: Container setting for organization resource type
